label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"鸡绦虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"赖利","labels":["disease"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"绦虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":29,"end":30,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"十二指肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":47,"text":"赖利绦虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":48,"end":54,"text":"棘沟赖利绦虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":55,"end":61,"text":"四角赖利绦虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":62,"end":68,"text":"有轮赖利绦虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 鸡绦虫病（Cestodosis）是由赖利属的多种绦虫寄生于鸡的十二指肠中引起的，常见的赖利绦虫有棘沟赖利绦虫、四角赖利绦虫和有轮赖利绦虫等三种。

label: [{"start":5,"end":6,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"火鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"雉鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"珠鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 各种年龄的鸡均能感染，其它如火鸡、雉鸡、珠鸡、孔雀等也可感染，17～40日龄的雏鸡易感性最强，死亡率也最高。

label: [{"start":3,"end":9,"text":"棘沟赖利绦虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":10,"end":16,"text":"四角赖利绦虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"大型绦虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":46,"end":52,"text":"棘沟赖利绦虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 病原：棘沟赖利绦虫和四角赖利绦虫是大型绦虫，两者外形和大小很相似，长25厘米，宽1～4毫米。棘沟赖利绦虫头节上的吸盘呈圆形，上有8～10列小钩，顶突较大，上有钩2列，中间宿主是蚂蚁。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"四角赖利绦虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":60,"end":66,"text":"有轮赖利绦虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 四角赖利绦虫，头节上的吸盘呈卵圆形，上有8～10列小钩，颈节比较细长，顶突比较小，上有1～3列钩，中间宿主是蚂蚁或家蝇。有轮赖利绦虫较短小，头节上的吸盘呈圆形，无钩，顶突宽大肥厚，形似轮状，突出子虫体前端，中间宿主是甲虫。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"棘沟赖利绦虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"四角赖利绦虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":36,"end":42,"text":"有轮赖利绦虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 棘沟赖利绦虫和四角赖利绦虫的虫卵包在卵囊中，每个卵囊内含6～12个虫卵。有轮赖利绦虫的虫孵也包在卵囊中，每个卵囊内含1个虫卵。

label: [{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"棘沟赖利绦虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"绦虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":22,"end":23,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"小肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"肠壁","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":30,"end":39,"text":"破坏了肠壁的完整性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":46,"text":"粘膜出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":51,"text":"肠道炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":52,"end":60,"text":"严重影响消化机能","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 临诊症状：由于棘沟赖利绦虫等各种绦虫都寄生在鸡的小肠，用头节破坏了肠壁的完整性，引起粘膜出血，肠道炎症，严重影响消化机能。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"成鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"下痢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":8,"end":19,"text":"粪便中有时混有血样粘液","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":32,"text":"雏鸡发育受阻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":43,"text":"成鸡产蛋量下降或停止","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":54,"end":58,"text":"肠管堵塞","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":56,"end":58,"text":"堵塞","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"发育受阻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"肠管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":70,"end":74,"text":"肠管破裂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":72,"end":74,"text":"破裂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":75,"end":80,"text":"引起腹膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":59,"end":63,"text":"肠内容物","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":70,"end":72,"text":"肠管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":35,"end":43,"text":"产蛋量下降或停止","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 病鸡表现为下痢，粪便中有时混有血样粘液。轻度感染造成雏鸡发育受阻，成鸡产蛋量下降或停止。寄生绦虫量多时，可使肠管堵塞，肠内容物通过受阻，造成肠管破裂和引起腹膜炎。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"绦虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"鸡体中毒","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"神经症状","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"食欲不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"贫血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":36,"end":43,"text":"鸡冠和粘膜苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":44,"end":48,"text":"极度衰弱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":49,"end":56,"text":"两足常发生瘫痪","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":57,"end":61,"text":"不能站立","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":64,"end":70,"text":"因衰竭而死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"瘫痪","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"两足","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 绦虫代谢产物可引起鸡体中毒，出现神经症状。病鸡食欲不振，精神沉郁，贫血，鸡冠和粘膜苍白，极度衰弱，两足常发生瘫痪，不能站立，最后因衰竭而死亡。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"幼鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"成鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"精神不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":17,"end":23,"text":"食欲早期增加","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"食欲减退","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":39,"end":43,"text":"饮欲增加","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":44,"end":48,"text":"消瘦贫血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"羽毛松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":53,"end":66,"text":"排白色带有粘液和泡沫的稀粪","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"白色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":67,"end":75,"text":"混有白色绦虫节片","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":65,"end":66,"text":"粪","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 幼鸡严重，成鸡较轻。病鸡精神不振，食欲早期增加，当自体出现中毒时，食欲减退，但饮欲增加，消瘦贫血羽毛松乱，排白色带有粘液和泡沫的稀粪，混有白色绦虫节片。

label: [{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"瘫鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":12,"end":17,"text":"进行性麻痹","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":65,"end":74,"text":"影响将来的生产性能","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"两脚","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]}]
text: 严重感染时，部分病例常有进行性麻痹，从两脚开始,逐渐波及全身，即出现瘫鸡，有时部分病例经过一段时间后鸡体中毒症状解除后不治自愈,但影响将来的生产性能。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"成鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"免疫疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":31,"end":36,"text":"产蛋量下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":37,"end":44,"text":"产蛋率上下浮动","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":53,"end":57,"text":"腹腔积水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":62,"end":66,"text":"神经症状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":83,"end":87,"text":"衰竭死亡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":55,"end":57,"text":"积水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":53,"end":55,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":58,"end":61,"text":"水档鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":67,"end":69,"text":"瘫鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":76,"end":78,"text":"细菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":79,"end":82,"text":"病毒病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 成鸡感染本病一般不显症状，但影响免疫疫苗时抗体的产生，严重时，产蛋量下降或产蛋率上下浮动，个别严重病例出现腹腔积水即水档鸡和神经症状即瘫鸡，常因激发感染细菌或病毒病而衰竭死亡。

label: [{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"脾脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":18,"text":"肝脏肿大呈土黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"土黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"脂肪变性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"变性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"易碎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":41,"text":"腹腔充满腹水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"脾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"脂肪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 剖检变化：脾脏肿大。肝脏肿大呈土黄色，往往出现脂肪变性，易碎，部分病例腹腔充满腹水；

label: [{"start":0,"end":9,"text":"小肠粘膜呈点状出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"点状出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":20,"text":"虫体阻塞肠道","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":42,"text":"肠道生成类似于结核病的灰黄色小结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":39,"text":"灰黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":35,"text":"结核病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"小肠粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 小肠粘膜呈点状出血，严重者，虫体阻塞肠道；部分病例肠道生成类似于结核病的灰黄色小结节；

label: [{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"营养衰竭","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":25,"text":"抗体产生抑制现象","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":39,"text":"卵泡变性坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"变性坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":46,"text":"新城疫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"成鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"卵泡","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 因长期处于自体中毒而出现营养衰竭和抗体产生抑制现象,成鸡往往还表现卵泡变性坏死等类似于新城疫的病理现象。

label: [{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"虫体","labels":["disease"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"小肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":23,"text":"肠粘肠增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":29,"text":"肠道有炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":39,"text":"肠道有灰黄色的结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":36,"text":"灰黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":44,"text":"中央凹陷","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":62,"text":"内可找到虫体或黄褐色干酪样栓塞物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":53,"end":56,"text":"黄褐色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":21,"text":"肠粘肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"炎症","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 病理变化：剖检可以从小肠内发现虫体。肠粘肠增厚，肠道有炎症，肠道有灰黄色的结节，中央凹陷，其内可找到虫体或黄褐色干酪样栓塞物。

label: [{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"禽类","labels":["type"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"绦虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":15,"end":24,"text":"立即对全群进行驱虫","labels":["control"]},{"start":28,"end":31,"text":"驱虫药","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 治疗：当禽类发生绦虫病时，必须立即对全群进行驱虫。常用的驱虫药有以下几种。

label: [{"start":2,"end":7,"text":"硫双二氯酚","labels":["drug"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"别丁","labels":["drug"]},{"start":22,"end":23,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 1、硫双二氯酚(别丁，Bithionol)，鸡每公斤体重150～200mg，鸭每公斤体重200～300mg，以1：30的比例与饲料配合，一次投服。鸭对该药较为敏感。

label: [{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"氯硝柳胺","labels":["drug"]},{"start":7,"end":10,"text":"灭绦灵","labels":["drug"]},{"start":24,"end":25,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 2、氯硝柳胺(灭绦灵，Niclosamide)，鸡每公斤体重50～60mg，鸭每公斤体重100～150mg，一次投服。

label: [{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"吡喹酮","labels":["disease"]},{"start":20,"end":21,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"绦虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 3、吡喹酮(Praziguentel)，鸡、鸭均按每公斤体重10～15mg，一次投服，可驱除各种绦虫。

label: [{"start":2,"end":7,"text":"丙硫苯咪唑","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 4、丙硫苯咪唑(Albendazolum)，鸡、鸭均按每公斤体重10～20mg，一次投服。

label: [{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"氟苯哒唑","labels":["drug"]},{"start":22,"end":23,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":38,"end":44,"text":"棘沟赖利绦虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 5、氟苯哒唑(Flubendazolum)，鸡按3×10-5浓度混入饲料，对棘沟赖利绦虫有效，其驱虫率可达92%。

label: [{"start":2,"end":8,"text":"羟萘酸丁萘脒","labels":["drug"]},{"start":58,"end":62,"text":"赖利绦虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":39,"end":40,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 6、羟萘酸丁萘脒(Bunamidine hydroxynaphthoate)，鸡按每公斤体重400mg，一次投服，对赖利绦虫有效。
